name: Crazy Poker
description:
Overview

Crazy Poker is an exciting take on the popular game of poker. The object of the game is to score points by making poker hands across a number of rounds.

Gameplay

In Crazy Poker you deal cards to one of three hands, trying to make the best poker hands possible. Once a card is placed it cannot be moved, which means you have to find a balance between chasing the high scoring hands and playing safe to ensure that you actually bank some points.

Games are played across a number of rounds and extra rounds are awarded based upon your score.

Your challenge awaits...
